Fuel production rate (kg output/kg input: Fuel production rate (kg output/kg input)2030 bench
Load min (% of max capacity): Load min (% of max capacity)2030 bench

Investment (EUR/Capacity installed): For a large-scale 95 t$_{NH_3}$/h plant capacity based on MMZCS2023 (includes ASU)
Using the 2025 benchmark value based on BhmWP12023

Fuel production rate (kg output/kg input: Consumption of non-purified water assuming a purification efficieny of 80% based on BhmWP12023. Conversion of purified water to hydrogen is stoechiometric (9 kg of water consumed per kg of hydrogen).

Load min (% of max capacity): Based on Papadias2021 assuming same values as of 2020
Investment (EUR/Capacity installed): Based on Induspart2023 for a working pressure around 100 bars

Investment (EUR/Capacity installed): From Induspart2023 assuming low lithium price
